alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:05PM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Number 1 Canyon, Number 2 Canyon, Entiat, Omak, Pangborn Airport, Winthrop, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Bridgeport, Okanogan, Tonasket, Chelan, Republic, Methow, Brewster, Cashmere, Twisp, Chesaw Road, Oroville, Boulder Creek Road, Mazama, Inchelium, Nespelem, Conconully, Disautel Pass, Wauconda, Loup Loup Pass, Wenatchee, and Sherman Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area; Western Okanogan County
